title: Build StickSmart ordering system with customer and seller portals

requirements.text: Implement customer authentication system with sign in and sign up functionality using Internet Identity
acceptanceCriteria: Customers can create new accounts
Customers can sign in to existing accounts
Authentication state persists across sessions

requirements.text: Implement seller authentication system with email and password sign in and sign up

quotes: another option to sign in and sign up as seller
logs in with email and password

acceptanceCriteria: Sellers can create accounts with email and password
Sellers can sign in with email and password credentials
Seller accounts are separate from customer accounts

requirements.text: Create customer order form with dropdown for quantity selection, room number input field, and display price of 14 rupees per piece with total calculation

quotes: drop-down option of how many they want and the room numbers
Each stick costs 14 rupees per piece

acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown allows customers to select quantity of sticks
Text input field captures room number
Price per stick (14 rupees) is clearly displayed
Total cost updates dynamically based on quantity selected
Order can be submitted to backend

requirements.text: Create backend order management system that stores orders with quantity, room number, timestamp, customer identity, and completion status
acceptanceCriteria: Orders are persisted with all required fields
Each order has a unique identifier
Orders include timestamp for sorting
Orders track completion status (pending or completed)

requirements.text: Create seller dashboard displaying all orders in a list sorted by latest first, showing quantity, room number, and timestamp for each order

quotes: see the number of orders in a listed form from the latest on top and the respective room numbers beside it

acceptanceCriteria: Orders display in descending chronological order (newest first)
Each order shows quantity ordered, room number, and order time
List updates when new orders are placed
Only authenticated sellers can access this dashboard

requirements.text: Implement stock management system where seller can mark items as out of stock, displaying a red indicator on the customer ordering page and disabling order placement

quotes: seller should be able to put up the stock out in red on the stick ordering page
customers won't be able to order

acceptanceCriteria: Seller has a control to mark stock as in or out
When out of stock, customer order page displays red out-of-stock indicator
Order form is disabled when stock is out
Stock status persists and updates in real-time for all users

requirements.text: Add order completion tracking feature allowing sellers to tick off completed orders in the order list

quotes: orders taken and completed can be ticked out by the seller for his convenience

acceptanceCriteria: Each order in seller dashboard has a checkbox or tick control
Sellers can mark orders as completed
Completed status persists in backend
Visual distinction between pending and completed orders

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, earthy tones (terracotta, amber, sage green) paired with clean typography and a minimal layout that emphasizes functionality and clarity for both customer and seller interfaces
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm, natural tones consistently across all pages
Typography is legible and professional
Layout prioritizes usability with clear visual hierarchy
Design is consistent between customer and seller portals

constraints: Use Internet Identity for customer authentication instead of email/password
All backend logic must be in the single main actor file
Frontend must use React, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
nonGoals: Payment integration (Google Pay or any payment gateway)
Email notifications to customers or sellers
Advanced inventory management beyond in-stock/out-of-stock toggle
